Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 29 April 2023
